ingredients.ingredient: 1 (1 pound) loaf frozen bread dough, thawed

cookingTips: Brush melted butter on rolls before applying Parmesan for golden, crispy crust
Bake according to bread dough package directions, checking that Parmesan is lightly browned
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What's the best timing to add the Parmesan coating to prevent it from falling off during baking?
